name: Partless Ron
description:
Ron cannot walk or jump, but all his desires to walk, jump and travel were so strong that one day he woke up in an incredible world where everything is possible and even a little more. Go on adventures with Ron and find new opportunities that he dreamed of, kill monsters, improve your body and have fun!

Partless Ron is a 2d platformer with metroidvania elements, the player explores locations, looking for new improvements to pass levels that he could not pass before, solving riddles of intricate locations and looking for the right way out.

Game features:
- Nice visual style
- Dynamic music
- Elements of Metroidvania
- Complexity
